plain: Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is fantasy, their favourite plot is a mix of adventure and comedy, their favourite setting is a parallel universe, their favourite writing style is a mix of humorous and imaginative, their favourite length is medium, their favourite topic is time travel, their favourite pacing is a mix of fast-paced and slow-burn, their favourite narrative structure is a mix of linear and non-linear, and their favourite themes are time travel and alternate realities.
